snippet: Mayor Mitch Landrieu of New Orleans writes that Gov. Bobby Jindal’s proposed religious freedom law in Louisiana is discriminatory.
abstract: Letter from New Orleans Mayor Mitch Landrieu responds to April 23 Op-Ed article by Gov Bobby Jindal of Louisiana concerning his support of religious freedom law in state.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Mitch Landrieu of New Orleans writes that Gov. Bobby Jindal’s proposed religious freedom law in Louisiana is discriminatory.

headline.print_headline: Battle Over a Bill: Mayor Landrieu vs. Governor Jindal
headline.main: Battle Over a Bill: Mayor Landrieu vs. Governor Jindal

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
